price: 6. Mitiya mosika na bango, mokolo oyo mobengi akobengaka epai (ya likambo) linene.
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
